CustomField.formula: IF(INCLUDES( Location__r.Which_dates_of_week__c , "Sunday"), "Sunday", NULL) + BR() + IF(INCLUDES( Location__r.Which_dates_of_week__c , "Monday"), "Monday", NULL) + BR() + IF(INCLUDES( Location__r.Which_dates_of_week__c , "Tuesday"), "Tuesday", NULL) + BR() + IF(INCLUDES( Location__r.Which_dates_of_week__c , "Wednesday"), "Wednesday", NULL) + BR() + IF(INCLUDES( Location__r.Which_dates_of_week__c , "Thursday"), "Thursday", NULL) + BR() + IF(INCLUDES( Location__r.Which_dates_of_week__c , "Friday"), "Friday", NULL) + BR() + IF(INCLUDES( Location__r.Which_dates_of_week__c , "Saturday"), "Saturday", NULL)
CustomField.label: Standard Working Days
